channel.title: Downloadable client
channel.description:
hey guys, im just wondering would someone be able to link to me a guide so i can make my client donwloadable. or even explain it?
thankyou

item.title: Downloadable client
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

well any CLASS file can be decompiled of course…but for the most part people won’t bother.

JAVA files can easily be edited though so just keep JAVA files out of the client. After you compile the client the JAVA files aren’t needed for the regular player because it saves the data or whatever in the CLASS file.

Read full topic

item.title: Downloadable client
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:12, topic:522661”][quote author=u loose link=topic=641158.msg4320420#msg4320420 date=1372150635]

I’m assuming you mean a cachedownloader?

i ment so i can give my friends a link and they can download my client and play it with me.
[/quote]www.mediafire.com

make an account (free)

upload your archived(winrar) file to it. Then share the link with your friend over skype or whatever you are using.[/quote]

will they be able to edit my client files though?

Read full topic

item.title: Downloadable client
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:6, topic:522661”][quote author=u loose link=topic=641158.msg4319785#msg4319785 date=1372072419]

Step 1: Go to this website: http://uppit.com/ there are other sites you may wish to visit but Uppit was first to mind.
Step 2: Click “choose file” and a browser menu thing should pop up! Make sure your client is in a .zip, .rar or .jar format otherwise you will not be able to upload. Select your client and click upload.

Step 3: Let the client upload and once it has finished (100%) copy the provided URL link and send it to your friends.

If your friends are retarded just like you, I can make a quick snippet on how to download files.

sorry mate, but im not retarded, im learning.
but thanks for that.
[/quote]

new to internet?[/quote]

funny.

Read full topic
